Wildfire:




Listening to the mind ambient, Wildfire still felt the new bot 
around. Also, she saw Megatron not so long ago. She had followed him 
for a short while before she went on her wolf hunt. Should she go to 
the foolish, new bot, or see to Megatron to tell him of the Vok 
threat? He looked around.
